org.apache.http.impl.conn

类 LoggingSessionOutputBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.impl.conn.LoggingSessionOutputBuffer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    SessionOutputBuffer
    已过时。 
    (4.3) no longer used.

    @Immutable
 @Deprecated
public class LoggingSessionOutputBuffer
extends Object
implements SessionOutputBuffer
    Logs all data written to the wire LOG.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LoggingSessionOutputBuffer

        public LoggingSessionOutputBuffer(SessionOutputBuffer out,
                                  Wire wire,
                                  String charset)
        已过时。 
        Create an instance that wraps the specified session output buffer.
        参数:
        out - The session output buffer.
        wire - The Wire log to use.
        charset - protocol charset, ASCII if null

      • LoggingSessionOutputBuffer

        public LoggingSessionOutputBuffer(SessionOutputBuffer out,
